ca.uqac.lif.cep.interpreter.Interpreter

  • Packages that use Interpreter 
    Package Description
    ca.uqac.lif.cep.interpreter
    Interpreter for queries written in ESQL, the Event Stream Query Language.

      protected Interpreter UserDefinition.m_interpreter
      An interpreter to parse the definition

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Interpreter Interpreter.addLineReader(String name, InputStream is)
      Like addStreamReader(), but creates a LineReader instead.
      Interpreter Interpreter.addStreamReader(String name, InputStream is)
      Creates a StreamReader from an input stream, and associates it to a placeholder in the interpreter's grammar.

      Extends the interpreter's grammar with new definitions

      Extends the interpreter's grammar with new definitions
